description: The House of Commons (HoC) requires, on an as-and-when required basis, the provision of awards for achieving years of service milestones and awards for other recognition activities via an online platform to recipients who include HoC Administration employees, Members of Parliament (MP) staff, House Officers, and Research Offices staff.
full_summary:
---

### Tender Announcement - Gift Bank for Recognition Activities

**Reference Number:** 2023-044

**Publication Date:** 2024-04-30

**Closing Date:** 2024-05-21, 13:00:00 EST

---

The Department of the House of Commons is seeking a service provider to deliver an online platform for gift management and recognition activities. This procurement involves the provision of awards for achieving years of service milestones and recognition activities for various groups, including House of Commons Administration employees, Members of Parliament (MP) staff, House Officers, and Research Offices staff.

**Contract Details:**

- **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal/Request for Quotation
- **Tender Status:** Expiré

**Description:**

This procurement is for the provision of an online platform to deliver gift management and recognition activities. The successful service provider will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing the platform, which will include the issuance of awards to recipients.

**Requirements:**

* Online platform for gift management and recognition activities
* Award management and tracking features
* Customizable platform to meet the needs of the House of Commons

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: 2024-04-30
* Closing Date: 2024-05-21, 13:00:00 EST

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Kaouthar Gherairi, Senior Contracting Officer
* Email: contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
* Phone: 1 613 992-8684

Please note that this tender notice has been made available on MERX. Interested service providers must access the documentation directly through MERX to ensure accuracy and authenticity. The Department of the House of Commons is not responsible for any tender notices or related documents accessed through third-party distributors.

---

**Note:** Information is subject to change; please consult the MERX website for the most up-to-date details. [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com) .
